author: Staff Reporter
text:
Avinashilingam School of Management Technology will conduct a six-day UGC-sponsored workshop on business skill development. A release says that the programme that is being held from March 14 to 19 is for women entrepreneurs. The workshop’s motto is ‘Skill India, Brand India’.

The basic qualification to apply for the programme is a pass in Plus Two. For details and registration, contact 98436-76144, 97903-40658 or send mail tobsdp.asmt@gmail.com.
title: TAMIL NADU
